Name: Loco Bonobo
About the game: Loco Bonobo is an indie platform shooter with ragdoll physics, gory mayhem and princess rides! Die constantly like you deserve whilst kicking ass as a lobotomized lab monkey slaughtering a never ending barrage of evil clones! INCLUDES: Platforming : wall jump!, corner-hop, 360Â° aiming, creamy controls 2nd Amendment Rights : small gun, bigger gun that shoots faster, wider gun that shoots wider, gun that shoots flames, grenade launcher, grenade launcher that shoots rockets, giant boxing glove launcher, limited edition fragocaster geetar, american cricket bat Ancient Monkey Phlung-Pu Martial Artistry : punch, kick, slide-Kick, uppercut, downercut groundsmash, swing-Kick Bionic Extendo Tail : swing like its the 70's, grab enemies!, throw at other enemies!, profit! Given : of course we gots the slo-mo Juicy Carnage : ragdoll physics, a bazillion combinations of skull fragmentation, destroy arms to disarm, disleg to slow encroachment Progressive Princessing : rescue her and then kick ass together Foursomes : up to 4 local multiplayers Gamepads: tested with ps4 and xbox one controllers
